body:
Comment 1: 
Go already has a garbage collector.

Please learn more about the goals of the Go project before filing bug reports that are
not related to the project.  The Go project is not intended to solve all possible
problems.  It is a specific programming language designed for specific purposes.  This
is not the place to ask for general things that you would like.  Thanks for respecting
our wishes in this matter.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
